hoursOfOperation: Monday - Wednesday, 11 a.m. to 11 p.m.  Thursday - Saturday, 11 a.m. to Midnight   Sunday, Noon to 10 p.m.   Minors: Allowed until 9 p.m.

name: Lucky Town Brewing Company
description: Living in Mississippi, the selection of beer has always been limited compared to the rest of the country – but that does not stop those of us who seek out the diverse supply of the world’s greatest beers. Some drive across state lines to acquire the finer choices at festivals and suppliers alike, while others exchange trades with those from other states in search of the locally forbidden. But for those who truly take matters into their own hands, homebrewing beer becomes the purest form of gratification.    Driven by an extreme passion for both innovation and beer, our Brewmaster took what was once just a dream and decided to create a beer that would not only break state laws but also help change the very same laws that Mississippi has let fall behind. For eight years, he brewed beers of many different styles as a hobby - and with each tasting that he would hold at his home, the crowds grew larger. Eventually, he would be convinced that this beer should be available to those patrons who also appreciate the finer beers of the world.    Lucky Town Brewing Company was founded on this very notion – to craft beers that break boundaries between the working men and women of Mississippi and their wish for locally produced premium beer. With that mission, Lucas Simmons decided to grant those wishes by sharing his passion for crafting beer in 2011.

name: Lumber Baron's Charcoal Grill and Brewpub
Lumberyard Brewing Company
description: Local Flagstaff brewpub and Micobrewery featuring award winning ales and lagers. Full menu with lots of sandwiches and BBQ. Great dance floor for late nite.

name: Lumina Brewing Company
description: Lumina Brewing Company is dedicated to producing beer in small batches. We brew our beer right on premises. All of our beer is fresh with no preservatives. We specialize in brewing German and Bohemian Style Beer. We brew our European Style beer in accordance with the Bavarian Brewing Tradition of “Reinheitsgebot”, the German beer purity law of 1516. This means that nothing is added to the beer except yeast, hops, water and grain. All of our Bavarian Style Beer contains malt and hops from Germany. Our Brew masters have extensively traveled Germany and the Czech Republic and have visited many breweries to learn the art of old world style brewing.
hoursOfOperation: Tuesday-Saturday: 11:00AM-6:00PM  Closed on Sunday & Monday

name: Luminous Brewhouse
description: Fine hand-crafted beers created on-site by head brewer and Sheridan native, Seth Orr. Located at 201 Broadway!

name: Lunar Brewing Co
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Thu: 12:00 pm - 1:00 am  Fri - Sat: 12:00 pm - 2:00 am  Sun: 12:00 pm - 12:00 am

name: Lynnwood Brewing Concern
description: You can call Lynnwood Grill "comfortable excitement.” It’s the kind of place where people know your name... and the bartenders know what you're drinking.    Now located across from the Raleigh Grande Theatre, this locally owned bar and grill is the perfect place to grab a bite before or after the movie. It’s also a cozy place to meet friends for drinks, watch a game, or listen to live music. When the weather is nice, enjoy drinking and dining on the outdoor patio or the spacious rooftop.

name: LyonSmith Brewing Co.
description: LyonSmith Brewing Co. operates in the amazing town of Penn Yan, NY. Our mission is to make beer that is worth drinking, a company that is worth working for, and a community that is worth living in.

name: Mac & Jacks Brewing Company
description: Mac & Jack’s Brewing Company proudly dedicates itself to preserving a clean environment as a responsible resident in Redmond and to the community at large. From re-using water to providing spent grain to local farmers, all byproducts created here during the brewing process are recycled responsibly. This makes for happy neighbors as well as happy cows!

name: MacDowell Brew Kitchen
description: MacDowell Brew Kitchen, the newest nano brewery in the area, introducing the finest in craft beers that are brewed on premises under the direction of several master brewers.  MacDowell Brew Kitchen has some very special beers on draught and bottles brewed by other nano breweries, around 150 to choose from.  Our menu includes BBQ, American Cuisine, and other surprises!
hoursOfOperation: Tues-Thurs: 11AM - 10PM  Fri-Sat: 11AM - 12AM  Sun: 11AM - 9PM  Mon: Closed

name: Machine House Brewery
description: At Machine House Brewery, we produce traditional English style Ales in small batches at our historic location in Seattle's Georgetown neighborhood.    Our goal is to deliver the authentic session beer experience to Seattle, meaning particularly drinkable ales with moderate levels of alcohol and bitterness.
hoursOfOperation: Fri: 3:00 pm - 7:00 pm  Sat - Sun: 12:00 pm - 6:00 pm

name: Macon Beer Company
description: Macon Beer Company, LLC is a craft beer company focused on innovation, sustainability, philanthropy, and developing a strong connection to our employees and community. We expect to maximize profitability without sacrificing quality, purity, or attention to detail through the use of engineering principles that improve value and efficiency beyond industry standards. We will strive to become a source of knowledge held in high regard by the craft beer industry. In addition, Macon Beer Company will become a respected business in the Macon area via investment in the community and promotion of an inviting and supportive business personality.

name: Mad Anthony Brewing
description: Looking for the best beer in town? Look no further my friend, Mad Anthony’s Brewery has got you covered. Grab a pint of our award-winning hand-crafted ales or lagers and kick back in one of our three locations. A cool, laid back atmosphere, full food menu, weekly live music, and of course an ever-changing menu of awesome beer is always in full swing. We offer one of the area’s best deep dish Chicago style pizzas, a variety of vegetarian selections, our now famous "Unwraps" and traditional pub fare. Whether you want something light, or are ready for a full meal, or need catering services for your next gathering, let us show you why Mad Anthony’s Brewery should be at the top of your list for fun!

name: Mad Anthony's Lakeview Alehouse and Reception Hall
Mad Anthony's Lake City Tap House
Mad Beach Craft Brewing Company
description: Setting itself as the premiere craft brewing company on the beach, Madeira Beach Craft Brewing Company (MBCBC) manufactures a whole host of craft brews from IPAs to Ales to seasonal specialties.  With an opening set for the fall of 2013, MBCBC is sure to leave a lasting impression on your vacation!

name: Mad Bomber Brewing Company
description: We are a craft brewery in Hayden, Idaho. Follow us for updates and promotions for our fall opening!!!    Inspired and financed by United States Army Explosive Ordnance Disposal Technicians (Bomb Squad), the Mad Bomber Brewing Company will offer a solid lineup of assertive American Ales.
hoursOfOperation: Thu: 2:00 pm - 12:00 am  Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 12:00 am  Sun: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm

name: Mad Crow Brewing & Grill
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Thu: 12:00 pm - 12:00 am  Fri - Sat: 12:00 pm - 2:00 am  Sun: 12:00 pm - 12:00 am

name: Brewery & Restaurant
description: Mad Fox Brewing Company offers a dining experience unique to the Washington, DC, area: upscale casual dining in an English-style gastro brewpub with an emphasis on high-quality food to complement our house-brewed beers.    Mad Fox features a chef-driven, seasonal menu and frequent specials including pizza, panini, salads and vegetarian friendly foods; fresh, locally grown seasonal produce, cheeses and other ingredients; locally raised lamb, bison, beef, chicken and game; and house-cured meats.    Mad Fox has a 63-foot long bar showcasing our seven to ten standard, house-brewed beers on tap as well as a rotating selection of seasonal brews in German, English, Belgian and American styles. Also, don’t miss our cask conditioned proper Real Ales served through water jacketed Angram beer engines, ensuring that every pint is served at properly conditioned cellar temperatures.
hoursOfOperation: 11am - 11pm, Monday - Wednesday  11am - Midnight, Thursday - Saturday  10am - 11pm, Sunday, Brunch 10am-3pm

name: Mad Hatter Brew Pub
description: Mad Hatter Brew Pub is the perfect spot for you to meet up with your friends and sample some local craft brews and grab a bite to eat. Located in Downtown Tempe, Mad Hatter is conveniently located across the street from the Veteran’s Way Light Rail Stop and Sun Devil Stadium.    Come on in say hello, grab some food and a beer and make yourself at home at the best brew pub in Tempe.
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Thu: 11:00 am - 10:00 pm  Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 12:00 am  Sun: 11:00 am - 10:00 pm

name: Brewpub
description: Craft-Brewery serving their own beer, root, birch beer, food and local wine. Live music on weekends.

name: Mad Jack Brewing Co.
description: MAD JACK BREWING CO.  The Van Dyck Lounge is proud to announce the recreation of the historic brewery that was once the center of Schenectady. Named after John (Jack) McDonald, Mad Jack Brewing Company is a collection of unique beers that each have their own personality and flavor. The same McDonald family that has brought you other unique establishments in the area, Pinhead Susan's, The Van Dyck Lounge and The Stockade Inn, welcomes you to stop by and have a taste for yourself!

name: Mad Lab Craft Brewing
hoursOfOperation: Thu - Sat. 3pm to 9pm

name: Mad River Brewing Company
description: Mad River Brewing company is now in our third decade of operation and even now it is hard to think of what we do as a business and not as a hobby. Brewing is a passion here and we spend a great deal of our time trying to perfect the next great taste.     At Mad River Brewing company we pride ourselves on the fact we are still here because of you. Without your support and your love for our passion we would not have made it this far. We love to hear from you so if you have something you wish to say good or bad by all means send us an email.

name: Madison Brewing Co, Pub and Restaurant
Magic Hat Brewing Company
description: The Saturnalian Saga of Magic Hat began in 1994 when our first batch of beer was brewed in a funky little space on Flynn Avenue, in Burlington, Vermont.  Dozens of beers and a brewery later, the Vermont brewery finds itself reaching more than 30 states with its unique take on classic styles.  Magic Hat continues to be a leader in craft beer and is currently the only craft brewer putting a performance in every bottle.

name: Magnetic Brewing
description: Magnetic Brewing is a San Diego Craft Nano Brewery specializing in high gravity beers brewed with quality hops, barley, malts and ajuncts.

name: Magnolia Pub & Brewery
description: Brewery and gastropub in San Francisco's Haight Ashbury District with a new production brewery and BBQ restaurant, Smokestack,now open in the Dogpatch neighborhood.

name: Main Street Brewery
description: Our Brew pub can seat around 150 people. We have a full bar with nine beers micro brews on tap, we also serve some domestic beer as well as some local wine. We have a down stairs game room with pool tables, foosball table, air hockey and a couple arcade games. We open at 11:00 A.M. Daily for lunch and we start serving dinner at 3:30 P.M. Until 10:00 p.m. then it's pizza in the bar! Come in on Sundays and watch the football games and other available sporting events!
hoursOfOperation: Winter Hours- 11:30 to close Friday Saturday Sunday Monday for lunch and dinner 3:30 to close- DAILY for dinner

name: Main Street Station Casino, Brewery and Hotel
Mainspring Brewery & Ale House
description: The Mainspring Brewery and Alehouse will be an inviting craft brewery and full service restaurant, where friends, families and business associates can break bread, share conversation and enjoy a fresh, delicious locally-produced beer.     Our target opening is Spring 2012. We are currently exploring a number of sites within the village of Hamburg, NY. For updates on our status, please visit our blog, and subscribe to our RSS feed (buttons to the right).     It is our vision to become a center of community pride as well as a popular destination for good food and drink.

name: Malty Dog Brewery & Supplies
description: Malty Dog Brewery & Supplies is a microbrewery, winery and homebrew store. Come have a pint or a glass of wine while enjoying the relaxed setting at our bar. If any of our beer or wine strikes your fancy, we'll give you the recipe and show you how to make it at home. So come shop, relax and enjoy. We also have free WiFi!
hoursOfOperation: Tues. - Sat. 11-9*  *crowd dependent after 8  CLOSED Monday, Sunday

name: Mammoth Brewing Company
description: Mammoth Brewing Co. has been brewing award-winning beers since 1995. We brew in the Whiskey Creek building, but our Tasting Room is about 2 blocks away at 94 Berner Street, behind the Village's parking lot in the second white building. Open daily 10am - 6pm.

name: Manayunk Brewery and Restaurant
description: During the 1800's and into the 20th century, Manayunk was known for the manufacture and sales of fine textiles. Krook's Mill, now the Manayunk Brewery and Restaurant, was one of the linchpins of the then booming industry. Anne Dawson opened the mill in 1822 at the mouth of the Manayunk Canal and the Krook family followed with the existing building just short of 100 years later in 1912. A cornerstone from the original mill was placed in the new building. Krook's Mill eventually closed its doors in 1992.    Four years later, Harry Renner IV brought the facility back to life as a space for retail business, a fine eatery, a brewery and as an entertainment complex for both neighbors and visitors alike to enjoy. Our first batch of fresh-brewed beer was tapped on October 17, 1996. In 2000, we expanded our outdoor seating with a deck overlooking the Schuylkill River. In 2003, we added a Stone Pizza Oven and a Sushi Bar to expand our menu selection. Today you can still find the scale, now an antique, that was once used to weigh the wool brought into the factory.

name: Manhattan Beach Brewing
description: Manhattan Beach Brewing is no longer brewing beer.
hoursOfOperation: Daily 11:30am to Closing

name: Mankato Brewery
description: Our goal is to bring craft brewing to Mankato Minnesota. Brewing great beer consistently and with the highest quality. Our plans are to have the brewery ready for production in the fall of 2011.
hoursOfOperation: Tue:  4:00pm - 7:00pm Thu:  4:00pm - 7:00pm Fri:  4:00pm - 7:00pm Sat:  12:00pm - 7:00pm

name: Manor House Brewing
description: Historically, beer has been brewed on premise at Manorhouses because it was difficult to transport. This led to a great diversity of beer in both taste and style. Manorhouses brewed to seasons and used beer as both sustenance and social lubricant. Manorhouses and the beer they produced were unique to families and the communities of which they were a part. We will fulfill all those same criteria.     Manor House Brewing represents an alternative to conventional beer, we are prideful in our local roots and want to inspire pride in our local community. Our beer is an output of a thoughtful creative process and we view what we do as art, not commodity. We experiment with new things, but try to predict the outcome in advance. Every so often, we accidentally stumble upon greatness.    Why do we want to brew beer? To satisfy a longing for the simple pleasures and a simpler time. Happiness, joy, and relaxation is our goal.    How are we different from every other craft brewer? The very same thing that makes us the same. We are creative, innovative and different. We do not feel compelled to brew to style as we may create our own, but when we do brew to style, we do so with passion.

name: Mantorville Brewing Company, LLC
description: Mantorville Brewing Company is located in historic Mantorville, Minnesota.  Visit us for a taste of the old days in this old-time setting.  Tours available by appointment only.

name: Marble Brewery
description: Marble Brewery is located in the heart of Downtown Albuquerque.  Marble is a hub for local lovers of craft beer, community, music, food, and fun.  We offer bold, award-winning, locally brewed craft beer in a lively pub setting.

name: Marble Brewery Westside Taproom
hoursOfOperation: Mon-Th 2:00 PM – 11:00 PM  Fri & Sat 12:00 PM – 11:00 PM  Sun 12:00 PM – 10:00 PM

name: Marin Brewing Company
description: Marin Brewing Co., Marin county's first brewpub, opened   April 1,1989. The general partner of Marin Brewing Company is Brendan Moylan, Brewmaster and Restaurateur. Much of the Restaurant's character and success can be attributed to Brendan's late partner Craig Tasley.    Marin Brewing Company is located at 1809 Larkspur Landing Circle, in the Larkspur Landing Shopping Center in Larkspur, California, 94939.

name: Mariner Brewing Company
description: "The Adventure Starts Here."    Brewer of small batch hand-crafted ales.    Mission - Mariner Brewing Company pledges to continually endeavor to brew finely crafted beer, while forever maintaining a strong sense of fun and adventure.

name: Maritime Pacific Brewing Company and the Jolly Roger Taproom
description: Maritime Pacific Brewing Company is our small, family-owned brewery, established in 1990. As traditional home port to Northwest mariners, the Ballard district of Seattle provides us the perfect setting for a brewery with a seafaring name and tall ship as its emblem. With its full-rigged white clipper ship set against dramatic Olympic Mountains, the Maritime Pacific logo recalls days past when fast windships once plied these Puget Sound waters laden with cargo for trade in exotic ports-of-call. To please the descendants of those bygone sailors in whom the taste for fine local beer lives on, and to salute Seattle's seafaring history, the Maritime Pacific Brewing Company was created
hoursOfOperation: Mon-Thurs. 11:00 am -11:00 pm        Fri-Sat 11:00 am - Midnight           Sunday 12 noon - 9:00 pm     Mon-fri Happy Hour 3-6:00pm

name: Market Street Brewing Company
description: Market Street Brewing Co. & Restaurant was founded in June of 1997 by Theresa and Pelham McClellan. Located on historic Market Street in downtown Corning, NY the brewpub embodies the essence of the  microbrew revolution. With six fresh beers brewed right on premise, and delectable “upscale” menu, Market Street Brewing Co. & Restaurant provides only the finest food and drink to our estimable patrons. Open seven days a week with rooftop seating and a bier-garten to compliment our dining room, bring the family and enjoy Corning’s first brewpub.

name: Marley's Brewery and Grille
description: Marley's opened in February of 2011, in Bloomsburg, PA.  They have up to 10 different styles on tap, with an American Style Pub Cuisine.  Come check out the nice interior and pet friendly patio.

name: Martin City Brewing Company
description: Martin City Brewing Company is Kansas City’s newest family owned restaurant and pub.  It sits nestled in Martin City, near the train tracks.  Martin City Brewing Company has a one of a kind food menu with top-notch chefs on staff.  There are over 50 different brews to choose from.  Not only will one find a cozy space inside the pub, but one can enjoy the beer garden and live music on any given weekend night.  With chain restaurants taking over the American landscape, this restaurant/tavern is a great escape from “the norm.”  The newly remodeled hundred-year-old building is far from your ordinary place next door.  Make Martin City Brewing Company your next night out and your neighborhood hotspot!!
hoursOfOperation: Monday - Saturday 11am to 1:30am  Sunday 11am - Midnight

name: Martin House Brewing Company
description: Martin House Brewing Company is a team of brewers, explorers, and dreamers. We avoid tradition in favor of adventure both in brewing and in life. We value good ingredients and good people. Each of our beers pairs perfectly with the memorable moments in life. We want to be your hand-crafted beer of choice that's there with you and your friends whether you're celebrating your most recent adventure or planning the next one. Martin House - Made in Texas by Texans."

name: Marzoni's Brick Oven & Brewing Co
description: Marzoni's beers are brewed on premise, utilizing the finest ingredients available. Beers brewed at Marzoni's are dispensed directly from our chilled serving tanks to the tap stations on the bar for the freshest beer around! On any given day, there are at least 8 beers on tap, not to mention house-brewed root beer. Brewery tours are available!

name: Mateveza Yerba Mate Ale
description: Jim Woods (artistic rendering left) is an avid yerba mate drinker. When not lounging around in his flowing camisa roja and matching gorra, he enjoys brewing flavorful craft beers and drinking them responsibly.    It was his love for hoppy beers and yerba mate coupled with his thirst for adventure, as evidenced by his ambitious patillas, that led him to discover MateVeza.    One day while partaking in an afternoon mate, he cracked open a pale ale that had a prominent flavor and aroma of cascade hops. Chispas flew as the flavors of yerba mate and cascade hops frolicked on his lengua, and the original perky pale ale was born.
hoursOfOperation: 12pm to 10pm

name: Maui Brewing Co.
description: Maui Brewing Co., with a brewpub in Kahana and production brewery in Lahaina, has built a reputation for creating handcrafted beers brewed using the finest natural ingredients.  We have become one of the area's most popular dining locations and are the island's only microbrewery.  Our menu offers a broad selection of fine foods to satisfy any palate.

name: Max Lager's Wood-Fired Grill & Brewery
description: Max Lagers Wood-Fired Grill & Brewery Atlanta    Max Lager’s is the oldest independent brewery restaurant in Atlanta and is known widely for its wood-fired cuisine and freshly-brewed beers.    Located on Peachtree Street in the heart of Downtown Atlanta, Max Lager’s Wood-fired Grill & Brewery is an oasis of authenticity in an environment of national chains. The beautifully renovated 10,000 square-foot historic building features an industrial loft-style ambiance, and is designed to host fun events for groups of up to 700 people.    Max Lager’s was one of the first restaurants to bring the fresh and natural wood-fired menu concept to Atlanta. The art of cooking with wood enhances the Max Lager’s experience with bold flavors simply not found with alternative cooking methods. We feel that the investment made in the wood-fired grill is an investment that pays great dividends to our guests.

name: Mayday Brewery
description: Mayday Brewery opened 11/30/2012 in an abandoned blanket factory built in 1923. Mayday's 900 sq ft tasting room is the original boiler room for the blanket factory. Mayday has another 600 sq ft of bar area and a large outside deck. Mayday packages beer for distribution and their tasting room is open Thurs-Friday 4-8 and Saturday 1-8. Brewery tours are offered Saturday on the hour from 2:00-6:00. At Mayday our motto is, "We try NOT to suck."
hoursOfOperation: Thu - Fri: 4:00 pm - 8:00 pm  Sat: 1:00 pm - 8:00 pm    Tours Saturday only 2:00 - 6:00  On the hour

name: Mayflower Brewing Company
description: Mayflower Brewing Company is a craft beer microbrewery located in historic Plymouth, Massachusetts. Founded in 2007 by a tenth great grandson of John Alden, beer barrel cooper on board the Mayflower, we are dedicated to celebrating the history and legacy of the Pilgrims by creating unique, high-quality ales for the New England market.
hoursOfOperation: Tasting & Tour Hours  Thursdays and Fridays 4:30PM to 6:30PM  Saturdays 11AM to 3PM

name: Mazama Brewing Company
description: We are a brewery in Corvallis, OR. We specialize in Belgian style beers made with the best ingredients the Northwest has to offer.

name: McCoy's Public House and Brewkitchen
description: Over 10 house brewed beers on tap at any given time served with American Comfort food with a twist.    We have been making beer for over 17 years and are one of the most popular brew pubs in the Kansas City area.
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Sat: 11:00 am - 1:00 am  Sun: 11:00 am - 12:00 am

name: McHale's Brewhouse
description: McHale's Brewhouse is a Scotch-Irish Pub with an attached nanobrewery. We have amazing food. We make our own beer batter from our Dixie Blonde. We have 5-8 rotating house beers on tap at all times.

name: McKenzie Brew House
description: McKenzie Brew House is a restaurant, brewery and night spot serving up fresh, upscale cuisine; creative, hand-crafted brews; and fun at its three PA locations!

name: McKenzie Brewing Company
description: All of our beers are brewed in very small batches so they are always fresh and at their peak. Our brewers consistently bring home awards from the Great American Beer Festival, 24 medals so far. Our award-winning beers are brewed at all three locations, where our brewers strive to push the creative envelope.  Our beer selection is both consistent, with four flagship brands, and fresh with new offerings of seasonal and dark beers.    Unfortunately we can not go under the Steelhead name due to Trademark issues so we will be McKenzie Brewing Company.
hoursOfOperation: Open daily at 11:30am

name: McKenzie's Hard Cider
description: McKenzie’s Hard Cider was founded in 2011 by Lenny Ciolek in Buffalo, New York. Lenny played a crucial role in the success of the Mike’s Hard Lemonade brand and was able to secure distribution for McKenzie’s utilizing existing relationships and a grassroots method of marketing.    McKenzie’s currently produces 5 different varieties of hard cider; Original, Black Cherry, Green Apple, Seasonal Reserve (cinnamon and nutmeg) and Lazy Lemon (lemonade blend). Its varieties have received several awards including Double Gold Medal for Black Cherry, and Silver Medals for Original and Green Apple at the 2012 New York Wine & Food Classic.    McKenzie’s can be found at a bar near you, or at Wegmans and Tops grocery stores, where it is the best?selling hard cider.

name: McMenamins Mill Creek Brewery
description: Since our first brew at the Hillsdale Brewery & Public House in 1985, McMenamins has produced more than 57,600 batches. In 2011 our breweries collectively crafted 3302 batches of beer (including over 250 new and unusual house-specific recipes) more than 47,263 kegs of beer or an astounding 5.8 million pints!    In keeping with McMenamins' company philosophy, our breweries believe that brewing "green" is brewing responsibly.    Many beer lovers are familiar with our ales, such as Terminator Stout, Hammerhead, Ruby, Edgefield Wheat, Black Rabbit Porter, Sunflower IPA and others. Read more about these "standards" and dozens of others, including our beloved seasonal ales.    Due to the nature of handcrafting, it's safe to say that no two McMenamins batches are identical. Science and technology provide the backbone for our craft, but it is the unique qualities of each brew house, and the individual brewer's ale-crafting style, that ensure you will enjoy liquid refreshments that are truly special and made with every care for the environment. Cheers!

name: McNeill's Brewery
description: Since 1992, McNeill’s brewery has consistently offered some of the Northeast’s finest beers. Brewmaster Ray McNeill has won accolades far and wide, including thirteen national and international awards.  Critics and food writers alike have praised McNeill’s products, including the Albany Times Union, “McNeill may be the best brewer in America,” or All About Beer Magazine, “The jewel in the crown of Vermont’s many fine beers.”  In 2008 McNeill opened the long rumored packaging facility just north of the venerable brewpub.  Today, McNeill’s packages ten different beers plus seasonals.

name: Medieval Brewing Company
description: Medieval Brewing Company offers handcrafted beers, ciders, mead and wine brewed in the fashion of Medieval Europe with a modern twist!

name: Melanie Brewery Company
description: We are a small contract brewer located in Gary, IN. We contract all of our brewing to City Brewing Co. in LaCrosse, WI.
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Fri:	8:00 am - 3:00 am

name: Melvin Brewing
description: This is the home of The Melvin Brewing Company. We are beer lovers that specialize in IPAs, but believe in crafting the best beer in any style. Accept for you know, like German and English beers and whatnot. Ok, Europe in general we reckon.  We are located in Thai Me UP Restaurant in Hole, Wyoming

name: Maggie's Pub
description: Menace Brewing is a small craft brewery operating out of Ferndale, WA. We pride ourselves in producing high quality ales of wide varieties.

name: Mendocino Ale House
description: We take great pride in being pioneers in the American Craft Brewing Renaissance and even greater pride in our range of ales that beer lovers all over the country have made Legends.
hoursOfOperation: Monday - Saturday 11am - 10pm    Sunday 12pm - 9pm

name: Metropolitan Brewing
description: From day one, every drop of Metro beer has been brewed and packaged by us, in our warehouse production brewery in the Ravenswood Industrial Corridor of Chicago. We're proud Chicagoans, honored to be offering up fresh lagers to the Chicagoland area.

name: Mexitaly
description: A fast casual restaurant specializing in fresh food served fast. NOT fast food. All of our food is made fresh on premise. Our goal is to have you say "that was the best_______ I've ever had". Hope to feed you soon!
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Sun: 11:00 am - 10:00 pm

name: Mia and Pia's Pizzeria and Brewhouse
MIA Brewing Co.
description: M.I.A. is a production brewery in South Florida. We are inspired by our tropical environment and culture. We are dedicated to the production of the finest hand-crafted beer. Our brands will be available at local bars and restaurants this Fall.

name: Miami Brewing Company
description: Miami's first production brewery.  After years of hard work we've finally started our own brewery. Using Miami as our inspiration we challenge ourselves daily by unlocking new tasty combinations using fruits, spices, and herbs. Built from scratch using local ingredients.
hoursOfOperation: Monday-Thursday 10:00am – 5:00pm  Fridays 10:00am-11:00pm *Cover charge to attend nightime event  Saturday 10:00am-11:00pm *Cover charge to attend nightime event  Sunday 12:00pm-5:00pm

name: Michelob Brewing Company
description: The Michelob Brewing Co. is a small, state-of-the-art brewery where some of the world's most skilled brewmasters have access to anything they need to craft new beer recipes. Admittedly, not every experiment works. But then, you only ever drink our finest results.

name: Michigan Beer Cellar
description: Michigan Beer Cellar is a microbrewery, small winery, and artisan distillery located in Sparta, MI.

name: Brewery & Pub
description: Michigan Brewing Company beers are hand-crafted with great care providing you with some of the smoothest, most well balanced beers money can buy.      From our Wheatland Wheat Beer to our Superior Stout, most of our beers have won gold and first place awards around the country.      Available throughout Michigan and surrounding states, look for MBC at your local bars, restaurants, and retail outlets.
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Thu:	10:00 am - 10:00 pm  Fri - Sat:	10:00 am - 12:00 am  Sun:	10:00 am - 10:00 pm

name: Mickey Finn's Brewery
description: Normally anywhere from 6 to 11 different Finn's made beers, changing with the seasons. Oldest, biggest, and baddest brewpub in Lake County.
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Thu:	11:30 am -11:00 pm  Fri - Sat:	11:30 am - 1:00 am  Sun:	11:30 am - 9:00 pm

name: Middle Ages Brewing Company
description: Step back in time to when men were men, women were brewsters, and hand-crafted fine ale filled every flagon. Your quest for great taste leads you out of the past and into Middle Ages Brewing Company where we are sworn to uphold the tradition of brewing beer in small batches. Taste the difference hand-crafting makes.
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Fri: 11:30am - 6:00pm  Sat: 11:30am - 5:00pm  Sun: 12:00pm 5:00pm

name: Middleton Brewing
description: Middleton Brewing is a small 1.5 barrel brew pub, located in south Everett.  It started as a hombrewers dream and through blood, sweat, and a lot of hard work and determination, was made a reality, by the Middleton family, in 2013.  Geoff Middleton, head brewer and owner, began creating his own ales in college and instantly fell in love with the brewing process and craft brew industry.  Middleton Brewing is family operated business, focusing community support, doing things right and supporting what we believe in.

name: Middleton Brewing
description: Middleton Brewing is a 10-barrel brewpub located in the heart of the Texas Hill Country. We specialize in Belgian, British, and American styles ales. We also do small batches of sours aged in Jack Daniels barrels as well as some "experimental" brews that we only serve in-house.

name: Midland Brewing Company
description: Midland Brewing Company is based out of Midland, Michigan. Our goal is to bring quality hand crafted beer to the greater Great Lakes Bay Region, through our on-site microbar, your local grocery store and through local restaurants and bars.

name: Midnight Brewery
description: Midnight Brewery is Metro Richmond’s newest micro brewery, located in Rockville, VA (just west of the city). We are extremely creative with our work and brew several limited edition beers. So stop in frequently; you never know what will be on tap.    We are family owned and operated; we answer to ourselves and ourselves alone. Craft brewing the best beers possible is our passion. We brew beers that we love, and we know you’ll love them as well. We’re proud to continue the great tradition of locally brewed Richmond beers. Be sure to come to the brewery, or stop in one of the stores or restaurants that serve Midnight. And check out our events page; you never know where we’ll pop up around town. You won’t be sorry.
hoursOfOperation: Tue - Thu: 4:00 pm - 8:00 pm  Fri: 4:00 pm - 9:00 pm  Sat: 1:00 pm - 7:00 pm

name: Midnight Sun Brewing Company
description: Since firing up its brew kettle in 1995, Midnight Sun Brewing Company has become a serious yet creative force on the American brewing front. From concept to glass, Midnight Sun relies on an "art marries science" approach, mixing tradition with innovation, to design and craft bold, distinctive beers for Alaska...and beyond.    We at Midnight Sun find inspiration in the untamed spirit and rugged beauty of the Last Frontier and develop unique beers with equally appealing names and labels. But the company’s true focus remains in its dedication to producing consistently high-quality beers that provide exciting flavor and satisfying refreshment in all seasons.    From our extreme Pacific Northwest locale, we offer our wonderful beers on draft and in 22-ounce bottles throughout Alaska. Some of these beers are also distributed in Washington, Idaho, Oregon and California. We invite you to visit our hardworking brewery and retail Loft in South Anchorage every chance you get!
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Sun: 11:00 am - 8:00 pm

name: Midtown Brewing Company
description: With our local roots, we take pride in our good relationships with local providers in the area.  Stop in for Locally Crafted Beers and more!

name: Migration Brewing Co
description: Migration Brewing caters to a diverse customer base who share a common love for quality beer drinking. In general our brew pub is geared to a creative and progressive crowd who enjoy a down-home drinking experience.

name: Mikes Hard Lemonade - Mark Anthony Group
Milepost 111 Brewing Company
description: Welcome to Milepost 111 Brewing Company. We have a nano-brewery (very small).  We are slowly integrating our beers onto Milepost's tap lines!  It is a gamble if you are going to show up and be able to try one of our brews!  We are certainly going to work on it so we can consistently have something on tap.     We also rent kegs and tap handles for your next function.  Please give us a call to reserve your next keg.

name: Milkhouse Brewery at Stillpoint Farm
description: Milkhouse Brewery at Stillpoint Farm is now open.  Visit us Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays. We offer handcrafted farmhouse ales made in small batches from hops and grains grown on the farm.  Check our web page and face book page for hours.    Check back in the coming months for our grand opening!
hoursOfOperation: Fridays 3pm to 7pm  Sat/Sun 1pm to 6pm.

name: Milkman Brewing
description: Milkman Brewing is a collection of local home brewers that found each other and decided to combine forces to offer locally made artisan beer for Pittsburgh and the surrounding areas!    Our goal is to become a licensed boutique brewery so we can make specialty local beer for private and public events.    We love that Pittsburgh is a city full of thriving small businesses, fantastic local eateries, and beautiful art. It is our hope to someday be known as one of the things that makes our city unique and wonderful!

name: Mill City Brew Werks
description: Mill City Brew Werks is a small craft brewery and restaurant based in Camas Washington. As we are locally owned and operated it is our goal to support other businesses within Southwest Washington area and utilize local products and services to bring you what you are looking for, quality craft beer and great food!    We use only the finest hops and grains in every batch of Mill City Brew Werks beer and it is our goal to provide you, our family, friends, and neighbors, only the best tasting locally brewed beer. This we can promise not only because we are the owners of Mill City Brew Werks but more importantly because we love beer ourselves and are honored to produce it in the Great Northwest where beer is a time honored tradition and not a fad.    We thank you for your support and putting your faith — and taste buds — in our product.

name: Mill Whistle Brewing
description: Mill Whistle Brewing is a one barrel brewery focused on exceptional craft beers despite our lack of sophistication. Mill Whistle Brewing is on the site of the 100 year old Safrit Lumber Mill. While this mill closed in the 70s the lumber yard next door is a viable operation. We have obtained the lovely steam whistle that announced lunch time in Beaufort every day for 100 years. Therefore, the brewery is named after this whistle. The brewery will be returning to the noon day whistle tradition.

name: Millking It Productions
description: MillKing It Productions (a.k.a…MIP) was founded in 2010 with a singular mission: To strip down all pretensions and preconceived notions of the craft brewing industry and create a truly memorable and focused catalog of fine beers. MIP does not have a sampling room or bar. We brew a limited number of stylistically and historically accurate beers. We will not jump from marketing wave to wave. We will not brew unbalanced fad beers. We will never put fruit, vegetables or other gimmicks into our beer. Finally, all beers will be packaged in draft, cask and what we see as the most responsible and best individual container…Aluminum Cans.

name: Millstone Cellars
description: From Farm to Bottle; we source local raw honey, fruits and apples to handcraft intriguing ciders and meads.

name: Millstone Pizza Company & Brewery
description: Pizza restaurant, Brewery, Sports Bar & Grill, Arcade, and Entertainment.

name: Millstream Brewing Company
description: Iowa's most award winning, oldest and largest microbrewery, located in the historic Amana Colonies.    To craft quality beer in the Midwest! Award-winning beers and sodas.

name: Milwaukee Brewing Company
description: The Milwaukee Brewing Company is the 'grown up' brewery name for the familiar Milwaukee Ale House in Milwaukee's Historic 3rd Ward.    The Ale House has always been brewing under the name Milwaukee Brewing Company. While we continue to brew at the Ale House, we have the 2nd Street Brewery located in Walkers Point.
hoursOfOperation: Tour Info  Friday: 4pm, 5pm & 6pm  Saturday: 2pm, 3pm & 4pm  Open House from 5 to 7pm ($10)

name: Milwaukee Ale House
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Thu: 11:00 am - 12:00 am  Fri - Sat:  11:00 am - 2:00 am  Sun:  11:00 am - 12:00 am
